tool_description: This api allows you to submit, retrieve and vote for jokes!
name: Joke
title: Joke

api_list.name: Submit a joke for approval
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to submit a joke for approval
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://joke3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://joke3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/joke"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "joke3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Downvote a joke
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to downvote a joke from the api

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the joke you want to downvote

api_list.name: Upvote a joke
api_list.description: Upvotes a joke from the api

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the joke you want to upvote.
